title: Moving Upmarket
description: Product-led growth and bottoms-up distribution can be a very powerful business model. Dropbox was a poster child of both. Besides being a product that “just worked” (table stakes), it grew from word-of-mouth and viral marketing campaigns. Its referral program with two-sided incentives was inspired by PayPal’s $5 signup bonus.
